body.name: Komodo by Sceptre 43" LED HDTV 3X HDMI 2.0 HDCP 2.2 VESA Wall Mount Ready, Metal Black 2018
features: Mobile high-definition Link (MHL) MHL allow streaming of contents from your compatible smartphone or tablet to scepter TV, which capitalize on the visually enhanced picture quality
Sub port Let’s you view your pictures as a slideshow or listen to your favorite music via the USB port. Just insert your flash drive into the USB port for the ultimate entertainment
Hemi HDMI not only delivers superior digital video and audio, but also, connects both to the TV with only one cable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice color and clear sound
reviews.reviewText: The Komodo by Sceptre 43" LED HDTV 3X HDMI 2.0 HDCP 2.2 VESA television is a good deal-the picture is clear and the sound is good. Shipping was on time and packed well. This T.V doesn't have to be mounted on the wall-it can also stand on a sturdy table/dresser as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best DUMB TV you can buy!!!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a dumb tv because it’s a Christmas gift to my great grandmother and grandpa, they obviously don’t know how smart TVs work. I had to get them one because they had a 250 lb Toshiba Box TV that was way older than me (I’m in my 20’s lol) and were in need of an upgrade. I got them this and I’m beyond excited. Does everything I need it to. Only thing I wish is that there were larger screen options. The 43” does the job but if I would have been able to spend $50 extra for a 55”, I would have jumped on it. Other than that, it’s great! I see other reviews commenting on sound quality, but I have to say, for this price point on a decent sized TV, you cannot complain! It’s truly worth the money if you’re looking for a DUMB TV!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after a week sadly , still no refund
reviews.reviewText: As many people commented in other reviews it was a good picture and decent sound quality. It's died completely in one week though so definitely not a great purchase experience. I don't mind when refurbs break and I have to return them but I have not been refunded my money back yet and that's not okay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A huge non-Smart TV with excellent picture quality and terrible sound
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a bigger TV in my living room for movie nights. I didn’t want to spend hundreds of dollars on a Smart TV when my Roku has all the streaming options I need. Non-smart TVs are getting almost impossible to find so I’m thrilled with this one and the price. The sound quality is very poor and tinny, so I’ll be getting a sound bar to make up for it. Other than that I have no complaints- it’s a great TV for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this it! I got it for my boyfriend’s studio & the picture on it is amazing, the sound could be a little better but is still nice! The TV is super thin and easy to mount! 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looking for a 'dumb' TV? I was and...
reviews.reviewText: ..I am so glad that I chose this product. The picture quality is really nice and the sound is what you'd expect from rear-firing speakers: average. The product was packaged really well. The assembly was simple -- Sceptre even included a screwdriver for the stand. There are NO internet features on this product. No Wi-Fi, no ethernet jack, etc. for those of you who want/need that. I was really, really pleased with myself when I saw the results upon power-on. Fantastic value. I ordered two other Sceptre TVs already!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good Picture, Adequate Sound, Nice Price
reviews.reviewText: Bought this on Cyber Monday, primarily for use as a PC monitor.This has an internal calendar and clock. The clock defaults to 2016, probably when the model was introduced, which would explain why so cheap.Picture was saturated and a tad on the green side for my eyes, but I was able to tone it down and balance it out enough that things don't look like a mushroom trip. Part of that was done through the Windows Video Calibration settings. I can see light areas when the picture is supposed to be a black screen. That can only be improved with a better backlight diffuser.Audio is, well, it's adequate if you're patient enough to fiddle with the audio settings, but even then it sounds like a cheap boom-box. Only redeeming quality in this department is that It has audio outs if you have an external amp and speakers of better quality. I might also take the back off and hook directly to external speakers.If I didn't need a new monitor post haste, I would definitely have waited until I could afford better, but for the price this will do for a year or so.
